title: Allocation Distribution Cancelation
description: Individual item for allocation distribution operations

individualAllocationIdentification.description: Individual allocation number assigned by the participant system
individualAllocationIdentification.$comment: This identifier is used by participants to track allocations in their own systems

allocationIdentification.description: Primary allocation identification number assigned by the system
allocationIdentification.$comment: This is the main identifier used by the central system to track allocations

accountIdentification.description: Specifies the account from the allocation

quantity.description: Quantity expressed as a numeric value with up to 17 decimal places
